Method.name: getFioShort
Method.Implementation: Set pLastName=$Get(pLastName) Set pFirstName=$Get(pFirstName) Set pFatherName=$Get(pFatherName) set result=pLastName if pFirstName'="" set result=result_" "_$extract(pFirstName,1)_"." if pFatherName'="" set result=result_" "_$extract(pFatherName,1)_"." quit result

Method.name: getStringXMLnoBreak
Method.Implementation: set len=$l(string),new="" for i=1:1:len { set pp=$e(string,i,i) if pp=" " set new=new_" " else set new=new_pp } quit new

Method.name: testIsProperty
Method.Implementation: if ($get(class)="")||($get(property)="") quit 0 set ok=$$$OK if '##class(%Dictionary.CompiledProperty).%ExistsId(class_"||"_property) set ok=0 quit ok
